profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.10 Transparency - Blend modes
profile.description: Only blend modes that are specified in ISO 32000-1:2008 shall be used for the value of the BM key in an extended graphic state dictionary.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Only blend modes that are specified in ISO 32000-1:2008 shall be used for the value of the BM key in an extended graphic state dictionary.
rule.test: BM == null || BM == "Normal" || BM == "Compatible" || BM == "Multiply" || BM == "Screen" || BM == "Overlay" || BM == "Darken" || BM == "Lighten" || BM == "ColorDodge" || BM == "ColorBurn" || BM == "HardLight" || BM == "SoftLight" || BM == "Difference" || BM == "Exclusion" || BM == "Hue" || BM == "Saturation" || BM == "Color" || BM == "Limunosity"

error.message: The document uses the blend mode not defined in ISO 32000-1:2008
